Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $138.99 - $129.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:00:15 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Small size–saving space

Small dimension (106 x 106 x 18 mm) and light weight (232g) make the mini pc more convenient to carry outside. You can also hang it behind the monitor, which greatly saves your space.

4K Dual display

Beelink T4 Pro can give you wonderful visual enjoyment thanks to the built-in HD Graphic 500. You can smoothly enjoy the 4K videos. Meanwhile, you can connect 2 displays at the same time with 2 HDMI ports, which greatly saves your time.

CPU: Apollo Lake Processor N3350

Beelink T4 Pro Mini PC is equipped with N3350 Processor (2M Cache, 1.10GHz up to 2.40GHz) and pre-installed with Win 10. The powerful hardware gives you a stable Internet environment.

Storage

Built-in 4GB LPDDR3 RAM and 64GB eMMC ROM, the mini computer has enough storage space for you to deal with daily work, watch videos, browse the Internet, home entertainment, etc. Fully meets your daily needs.

Dual WiFi and Bluetooth

T4 Pro Mini PC provides 2.4G + 5.8G dual WiFi, Gigabit Ethernet and Bluetooth 4.0. You can enjoy stable wireless connection and high transfer speed.

Heat sink and fan

The powerful heat dissipation function (built-in heat sink and quiet fan) enables the mini desktop computer to cool down in time, improving the operating efficiency.

Interface: 1 x DC in port, 4 x USB 3.0 ports, 1 x LAN port, 2 x HDMI ports, 1x Audio Jack (HP&MIC)Packages: 1 x T4 Pro Mini PC, 1 x HDMI Cable (100cm), 1 x Power Adapter 12V/1.5-2A, 1 x User Manual

[N3350 Processor] Beelink T4 Pro mini pc has installed with Win 10 Apollo Lake Processor N3350 which has 2M Cache, 1.1GHz up to 2.4GHz. It provides a stable environment for work and entertainment.
[4GB RAM and 64GB eMMC ROM] Loaded with 4GB RAM and 64GB eMMC ROM, the mini computer could offer you enough memory storage to meet your daily needs such as entertainment, video, web browsing, and work.
[Dual HDMI] With 2 HDMI ports, the mini pc can easily connects 2 monitors at the same time. Meanwhile, it comes with HD Graphics 500 so you can enjoy the web surfing, home theater, game and so on with your family members.
[Dual WiFi and Bluetooth] The mini pc provides 2.4G + 5.8G dual WiFi and Gigabit Ethernet. It means that you can transfer and download data at a high speed. Besides, you are available to connect with many devices which support Bluetooth connection because of the built-in Bluetooth 4.0.
[Ultra-thin Stylish Design] Thanks to the ultra thin design (106 x 106 x 18 mm and light weight of 232g), this mini pc can be hang behind the monitor and even carried on the journey, which can greatly save your space. Besides, it has the fan and heat sink to cool down the pc and make the cpu and hard drive work normal.

Read more

Price: $39.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:30:42 UTC – Details)

Product Description

ADVANCE L5

Effortless Screen

The Advance L5 showcases a pleasant 4″ display with vivid colors for a compact phone. play your favorite games or view the latest Netflix movie on the go with the mighty Advance L5.

Seamsless Performance

The Advance L5 is equipped with a 1.3GHz Quad-Core processor that will give users the ability to execute all tasks seamlessly.

Simple Form

Simple and easy does the job. the base foundation for the Advance L5 is that it takes all the unnecessary elements and removes it to give users a great design that is appealing to the eye. A beautiful pattern graces the battery cover for a great hand held experience.

ADVANCE L5

Storage

With 16GB of internal memory, all your pictures and videos can be stored and accessed with ease.

Dual SIM

Stay globally connected with friends and family while traveling the world. The Advance L5 comes with 3G 850/1700/1900 or 850/1900/2100 to ensure you always have access to worldwide carrier coverage while you’re on the go. Take advantage of different voice and data plans for better rates, better coverage and separate bills with the Advance L5 Dual SIM Slots.

A Camera For Any occasion

Snap those memorable moments with confidence on the ADVANCE L5’s 5 Megapixel main camera with LED flash. Smile and post the coolest selfie with a 2 Megapixel front camera.

4.0” Touchscreen Display
5MP Main Camera with flash + 2MP Selfie Camera
16GB Internal memory 512MB RAM Micro SD up to 64GB, 1.3GHz Quadcore processor with Mali-400 GPU
Unlocked and ready to use with your preferred GSM Carrier. Compatible with T-Mobile, Metro PCS, and others. Sim card not included. (Not compatible with AT&T, Cricket or with CDMA Networks like Verizon, Sprint, and Boost Mobile)

Read more

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $859.95 - $799.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 01:54:54 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Oemgenuine sells some computers with upgraded configurations. If the computer has modifications (listed above), then the manufacturer box is opened for installation and testing purposes. If no modifications are listed, the item is unopened and untested.

Operating System: Genuine Microsoft Windows 10 Pro 64 Bit *Windows 11 Ready* (Windows 10 Pro preloaded, will be able to upgrade to Windows 11 Pro)

Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 Pro 5650G [6 Cores] (3.9GHz – 4.4GHz, 3MB L2 / 16MB L3)

RAM: 32GB DDR4 3200MHz

Graphics: Integrated AMD Radeon Graphics

Storage: 1TB Solid State Drive NVMe 4.0

Form Factor: Small Form Factor (SFF)

Optical Drive: DVD±RW

Wireless: Wi-Fi N150 802.11b/g/n + Bluetooth 4.0

Keyboard: Lenovo Traditional Keyboard (USB connector), English, black

Mouse: Lenovo Calliope Mouse (USB connector), black

Front Ports: 2x USB 3.2 Gen 1, 2x USB 3.2 Gen 2, 1x USB-C 3.2 Gen 1, 1x headphone / microphone combo jack (3.5mm), 1x microphone (3.5mm)

Rear Port: 4x USB 2.0, 1x HDMI, 2x DisplayPort, 1x serial (9-pin), 1x Ethernet (RJ-45), 1x line-out (3.5mm)

Audio: High Definition (HD) Audio, Realtek ALC623-CG codec, internal speaker 1Wx1

Power Supply: 260W 85%

Weight: 11.7 LBS

Power to work

The ThinkCentre M75s Gen 2 desktop will breeze through your toughest. Multitask, create content, and crunch data easily, improving productivity and the bottom line.

Steadfast security

The Thinkcentre M75s Gen 2 small form factor desktop’s discrete Trusted Platform Module (dTPM) chip encrypts critical information and enables hardware authentication. BIOS-based Smart USB Protection prevents unauthorized access via peripheral. And AMD GuardMI technology enables power-on-to-power-off data protection with a co-processor inside the AMD Ryzen PRO CPU.

Convenience guaranteed

Turn on the desktop with a simple key stroke. Connect multiple peripherals to a variety of ports, for seamless multitasking. Easily manage updates, diagnostics, and security from a remote location.

Energy-efficient and reliable

The M75s Gen 2 has a minimal footprint on the environment as well as on your desk. It meets global sustainability standards. It’s designed and rigorously tested for durability and reliability.

Windows 10 Pro Preloaded – Upgradeable to Windows 11 Pro

PCs will come preloaded with Windows 10 Pro and will be able to upgrade to Windows 11 Pro when it becomes available for the device. The upgrade rollout plan for Windows 11 Pro is in progress and will continue into 2022.

Can I continue to use Windows 10 Pro?

Yes. You do not have to upgrade to Windows 11 Pro. Microsoft will continue to support Windows 10 Pro until October 14, 2025.

Can I switch back to Windows 10 Pro after I upgrade if I do not like Windows 11 Pro?

Yes. Once you have upgraded to Windows 11 Pro, you have 10 days to move back to Windows 10 Pro while keeping files and data that you brought along with you. After that 10-day period, you will need to back up your data and do a “clean install” to move back to Windows 10 Pro.

Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 Pro 5650G [6 Cores] (3.9GHz – 4.4GHz, 19MB Cache)
Storage: 1TB NVMe 4.0; RAM: 32GB DDR4 3200MHz; Graphics: AMD Radeon
OS: Windows 10 Pro (Windows 11 Pro Ready); Optical Drive: DVD±RW; Wi-Fi + BT
Warranty: 3-Year Onsite Lenovo Warranty / 3-Year Oemgenuine Limited Warranty
